properties.description: This dataset represents the source configuration for ingesting raw retail sales data from the retail_sales directory within the raw-dev container of the ADLS Gen2 storage account. It serves as the initial landing zone for unprocessed CSV files ingested into the RetailVerse data lake environment.
annotations: Source dataset for ingesting unprocessed retail sales data (CSV format) from raw-dev/retail_sales in ADLS Gen2. Used in the batch ingestion pipeline for data lake landing.
